channel.title: Cache auto downloader help!
channel.description: me and my friend are trying to get this to work but no matter what we do or how many times we try to fix it it dosent want to work. we are using a trisidiax v3 and were just stuck if you have any experience with this or this source please post on here or pm me on my skype. (my skype name is: irishm3ta1) help would be much appreciated

item.title: Cache auto downloader help!
item.dc:creator: @justinmperry justinmperry
item.description:
@justinmperry wrote:

If no fix yet, make sure your cache link as well as the CacheVersion.txt links work and are direct. Make sure the version number in that cacheversion.txt matches what’s in your signlink too. Delete the half cache thats there so it can re-download it.

Read full topic

item.title: Cache auto downloader help!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

The cache downloader that came with trisidia’s source is crap, imo, I’d get a new one in general. However, technically a cachedownloader issue is client sided.
Make sure your zip for your cache is all the cache files (the main_cache’s and the sprites folder, and all those) and NOT the cache folder itself (the “YOURSERVERNAME_CACHE” folder).

Make sure the link you use is a direct link, meaning opening it in a browser would start the download as soon as you got to the page.

Read full topic

item.title: Cache auto downloader help!
item.dc:creator: @lol_space1 lol space
item.description:
@lol_space1 wrote:

Still having problems? Haha, just a tip I wouldn’t use the source BUT not telling you not to;) My advice, if you’re still having an issue reply, and I can help .
